document.docAuthor: Schmidt, C. A. & Shattuck, S. O.
document.masterDocTitle: The Higher Classification of the Ant Subfamily Ponerinae (Hymenoptera: Formicidae), with a Review of Ponerine Ecology and Behavior

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Higher Classification of the Ant Subfamily Ponerinae (Hymenoptera: Formicidae), with a Review of Ponerine Ecology and Behavior

subSubSection.paragraph:
Brown (1978) revised the species-level taxonomy of
Anochetus
, and his keys are still the most complete for the genus despite being slightly outdated; the Malagasy species have recently been examined by Fisher & Smith (2008) while the Australia species were revised by Shattuck & Slipinska (2012) .

A. haytianus Wheeler, W.M. & Mann, 1914
: Haiti

: Dominican Amber

: Dominican Amber
